primary_diagnosis.justification: History confirms prior Major Depressive Episodes (MDEs), supporting 'recurrent' specifier. Current presentation, requiring the recent initiation of *Sertraline* (4 weeks ago) due to ongoing, impactful symptoms, meets criteria for a current MDE, categorized as Moderate severity (based on clinical judgment provided by the team). No history of mania or hypomania reported.
dsm_criteria_met: Meets full criteria for a current Major Depressive Episode
History of at least one prior Major Depressive Episode
No history of manic or hypomanic episodes (rules out F31.x)
Symptoms cause clinically significant distress or impairment

ruled_out.reason: Transcript confirms a history suggestive of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder*.
Clinical Entity Agent confirms patient denies any manic or hypomanic episodes.

While passive ideation is present, it is a symptom of the primary disorder (*Major Depression*) and typically not coded separately in the primary psychiatric diagnosis setting unless it is the sole focus of treatment or crisis.
